p.2: Wizsolution is located in Princeton NJ, which is a leader in pharmaceutical recruitment and staffing. Our goal is to provide effective solutions for fulfilling your career potential. The mission of our company is to connect high talent and motivated candidates to technical positions from our partner companies.
